name: Why Work When You Can Film? Download.
name_original: Why Work When You Can Film? Download.
description:
A small game that I made for a university project. With 116 passages it has a run-time of around 15 minutes. I hope you enjoy. It's now downloadable.

Credits:

Game by Greg Alderton. (https://twitter.com/GregoryAlderton)

Cover picture: Photo by Markus Spiske on Unsplash

Music: Aquarium by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5738-aquarium License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
